name: Polaroid
lyrics:
[Verse]
Quick—quick—quick
Take pic
Check inside of my brain
Can't develop any colors
'Cause the ink's all the same
Got—got a pen
Paper too
Don't know what to fuckin' do
Answer me this simple riddle 'cause I
Ain't got no clue
[Verse]
Quick—quick—quick
Take pic
Check inside of my brain
Can't develop any colors
'Cause the ink's all the same
Got—got a pen
Paper too
Don't know what to fuckin' do
Answer me this simple riddle 'cause I
Ain't got no clue
